example.eg: Just put your drink on the table beside the sofa.  To register for the conference, you need to go to that table over there.
example.egtrans: 把饮料放在沙发边的桌子上就行了。要参加本次会议，你需要到那边那张桌子那儿去注册。

example.eg: The presentation included a table that showed the sales growth.
example.egtrans: 这次的演示包含有一张表格，显示了销售额的增长。

example.eg: The two sides sat down at the table to negotiate a peace agreement.
example.egtrans: 双方入座谈判桌，来磋商达成一份和平协议。

example.eg: The table toasted the couple.
example.egtrans: 那桌人向那对新人祝酒。

example.eg: The chef prepared a delicious table.
example.egtrans: 大厨准备了一桌美味佳肴。

example.eg: I need a table to spread paste on this wallpaper.
example.egtrans: 我需要一个平面来给这个墙纸涂抹粘胶。

example.eg: The mason carved names into the table.
example.egtrans: 泥瓦匠将名字刻到石碑上。

example.eg: The diamond had a flawless table.
example.egtrans: 钻石的切平面完美无瑕。

example.eg: The trucks climbed out of the valley and onto the table.
example.egtrans: 卡车爬出了峡谷，到达了高地。

example.eg: The table had lowered substantially and the well went dry.
example.egtrans: 地下水位大幅下降，水井也干涸了。

example.eg: This matter needs to be tabled immediately.
The committee voted to table the legislation, effectively killing it.
I would like you to table all our sales figures for this month.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…制成表格, 把…列成表格

dsense.name: actuarial table, actuarial life table, life table

example.eg: I keep my phone on my bedside table.
example.egtrans: 我把手机放在床头桌上。

example.eg: No one could play while Amanda lay on the billiard table.
The whole family gathers around the breakfast table when Mom makes waffles.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 打牌用的小桌, 牌桌

dsense.name: coffee table, also US: cocktail table

example.eg: Please don't put your feet on the coffee table.
example.egtrans: 请不要把你的脚放在矮茶几上。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 茶几上摆设用书，大型画册

example.eg: Brian was sitting at corner table in the restaurant.
We keep family heirlooms and our good china in a credenza in the dining room.

dsense.name: deal table
dsense.guideword: UK, dated (table of cheap pine wood)

example.eg: I generally eat my breakfast at the dinette table.
The dining table is of good quality wood.
A white linen tablecloth covered the dining-room table.
My mother always told me not to scratch myself at the dinner table.
These days most architects have abandoned their drafting tables for computers.
I always imagine an actress sitting at her dressing table, applying her make-up.

dsense.name: end table
dsense.guideword: (small table at end of sofa) (置于沙发旁的小桌子)

example.eg: Farm-to-table promotes local, organically grown food.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 从农场到餐桌, 原生态
从农场到餐桌的, 原生态的

example.eg: Everyone in the family enjoys the nightly conversation at the kitchen table.
James was happy because his football team was top of the league table.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 联赛积分榜, 联赛排名

example.eg: Try as I might, I never managed to memorize the entire multiplication table.

dsense.name: napkin, table napkin, also UK: serviette

example.eg: Erin wiped her mouth with a napkin.  An embroidered serviette was placed next to each plate.
example.egtrans: 艾琳用餐巾纸擦了擦嘴。每个盘子旁边铺着一张刺绣餐巾。

example.eg: I keep a glass of water on my night table.

dsense.name: on the table
dsense.guideword: figurative (topic: for discussion or negotiation) (话题等)

example.eg: The proposal on the table was offered by Mr. Smith.
The patient was lying on the operating table while the surgeon prepared her instruments.

dsense.name: periodic table, periodic table of elements

example.eg: The noble gases are in the last column of the periodic table.
The park has picnic tables and a play area.
The pub's games room has a pool table, dartboard, and jukebox.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （有六个落袋的）撞球台, 台球台

example.eg: I was $10,000 ahead but I lost it all at the roulette table.
He was an expert in his subject, and participated in round tables.

dsense.name: set the table, also UK: lay the table
dsense.guideword: (lay place settings for a meal) (准备吃饭)

example.eg: My mother asked me to set the table whilst she cooked our dinner.
Dinner's almost ready – will you all please come and sit down at the table.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在餐桌前就坐, 准备就餐

example.eg: We will sit down at the table later in the week to discuss terms.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在谈判桌前就坐, 准备开始谈判

example.eg: The cat climbed up onto the sideboard and knocked the table lamp off.

dsense.name: table linen
dsense.guideword: (cloth and napkins for a dining table) (台布、餐布、放盘子的垫子等)

example.eg: His mother's in despair because he has the table manners of a pig.
In most English-language books the table of contents is at the front.
example.egtrans: 多数英文书目的目录都在前面。

dsense.name: table runner
dsense.guideword: (fabric strip used to decorate a table)

example.eg: I was told to gargle with table salt dissolved in warm water.
Good table tennis players have to be very quick on their feet.
example.egtrans: 优秀的乒乓球运动员必须移动迅速。

example.eg: Mikael Appelgren is one of the best table tennis players in the world.
When we arrived for Thanksgiving, the tabletop was completely covered with every kind of dish you could imagine.
Do you have any fun tabletop games?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 桌上用的, 平面上用的

example.eg: Secure your tray table when the airplane's coming in to land.
The construction foreman pays his day laborers under the table.
I don't really remember the party; I think I spent most of it under the table.
We bought an antique vanity at a flea market.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 地下水位, 地下水面
